entry.title: Octopress to Wordpress
entry.content:
發現一個將Octopress的文章轉移到Wordpress的方法(使用python script)

*1. 首先新增一rss.xml到source中

    ---
    layout: nil
    ---
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
    <rss xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" version="2.0">
    <channel>
        <atom:link rel="hub" href="http://pubsubhubbub.appspot.com" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"/>
        <title>Bit By Bit</title>
        <generator>Octopress</generator>
        <link>http://acchuang.github.io</link>

        
        <item>
        <title>Octopress to Wordpress</title>
        <description>
發現一個將Octopress的文章轉移到Wordpress的方法(使用python script)



*1. 首先新增一rss.xml到source中



    ---
    layout: nil
    ---
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
    <rss xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" version="2.0">
    <channel>
        <atom:link rel="hub" href="http://pubsubhubbub.appspot.com" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"/>
        <title>Bit By Bit</title>
        <generator>Octopress</generator>
        <link>http://acchuang.github.io</link>


        <item>
        <title>Octopress to Wordpress</title>
        <description>發現一個將Octopress的文章轉移到Wordpress的方法(使用python script)




*1. 首先新增一rss.xml到source中



    ---
    layout: nil
    ---
    <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
    <rss xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" version="2.0">
    <channel>
        <atom:link rel="hub" href="http://pubsubhubbub.appspot.com" xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"/>
        <title>{{ site.title | xml_escape }}</title>
        <generator>Octopress</generator>
        <link>{{ site.url }}</link>

        {% for post in site.posts limit: 20 %}
        <item>
        <title>{{ post.title | xml_escape }}</title>
        <description>{{ post.content | expand_urls: site.url | cdata_escape }}</description>
        <link>{{ site.url }}{{ post.url }}</link>
        <pubDate>{{ post.date | date_to_xmlschema }}</pubDate>
        <guid>{{ site.url }}{{ post.id }}</guid>
        </item>
        {% endfor %}
    </channel>
    </rss>




原出處:http://5minutenpause.com/blog/2012/06/08/rss-finally-working-again/[https://gist.githubusercontent.com/5minpause/2896245/raw/rss.xml]



*2. Octopress使用的是atom.xml 所以要修改_config.yml中
    subscribe_rss:“/rss.xml”



*3. 在Terminal中執行jekyll generate然後就會將Octopress中的文章由atom.xml轉成到public/rss.xml.xml，然後再由Wordpress後台Import rss就可以了！
            http://acchuang.github.io/blog/2015/06/18/octopress-to-wordpress/
            2015-06-18T15:09:14+08:00
            http://acchuang.github.io/blog/2015/06/18/octopress-to-wordpress
            



        <item>
        <title>RandomShotOfMine</title>
        <description><p><img src="https://c4.staticflickr.com/8/7764/17153934689_b3fc604841_z.jpg" alt="Flickr" /></p>





            http://acchuang.github.io/blog/2015/06/12/randomshutofmine/
            2015-06-12T21:16:04+08:00
            http://acchuang.github.io/blog/2015/06/12/randomshutofmine
            



        <item>
        <title>Octopress Rake command reference</title>
        <description><pre><code>rake clean</code></pre>




 # Clean out caches: .pygments-cache, .gist-cache, .sass-cache






rake copydot[source,dest]






 # copy dot files for deployment






rake deploy 






 # Default deploy task






rake gen_deploy






 # Generate website and deploy






rake generate 






 # Generate jekyll site






rake install[theme]






 # Initial setup for Octopress: copies the default theme into the path of Jekyll’s generator.






rake integrate 






 # Move all stashed posts back into the posts directory, ready for site generation.






rake isolate[filename]






 # Move all other posts than the one currently being worked on to a temporary stash location (stas…






rake list






 # list tasks






rake new_page[filename]






 # Create a new page in source/(filename)/index.markdown






rake new_post[title]






 # Begin a new post in source/_posts






rake preview 






 # preview the site in a web browser






rake push






 # deploy public directory to github pages






rake rsync






 # Deploy website via rsync






rake set_root_dir[dir]






 # Update configurations to support publishing to root or sub directory






rake setup_github_pages[repo]






 # Set up _deploy folder and deploy branch for Github Pages deployment






rake update_source[theme]






 # Move source to source.old, install source theme updates, replace source/_includes/navigation.ht…






rake update_style[theme]






 # Move sass to sass.old, install sass theme updates, replace sass/custom with sass.old/custom






rake watch






 # Watch the site and regenerate when it changes





            http://acchuang.github.io/blog/2015/06/11/octopress-rake-command-reference/
            2015-06-11T15:36:31+08:00
            http://acchuang.github.io/blog/2015/06/11/octopress-rake-command-reference

    </rss>




原出處:http://5minutenpause.com/blog/2012/06/08/rss-finally-working-again/[https://gist.githubusercontent.com/5minpause/2896245/raw/rss.xml]



*2. Octopress使用的是atom.xml 所以要修改_config.yml中
    subscribe_rss:“/rss.xml”



*3. 在Terminal中執行jekyll generate然後就會將Octopress中的文章由atom.xml轉成到public/rss.xml.xml，然後再由Wordpress後台Import rss就可以了！

</description>
        <link>http://acchuang.github.io/blog/2015/06/18/octopress-to-wordpress/</link>
        <pubDate>2015-06-18T15:09:14+08:00</pubDate>

        <item>
        <title>Octopress Rake command reference</title>
        <description>
rake clean




 # Clean out caches: .pygments-cache, .gist-cache, .sass-cache



rake copydot[source,dest]




 # copy dot files for deployment



rake deploy 




 # Default deploy task



rake gen_deploy




 # Generate website and deploy



rake generate 




 # Generate jekyll site



rake install[theme]




 # Initial setup for Octopress: copies the default theme into the path of Jekyll’s generator.



rake integrate 




 # Move all stashed posts back into the posts directory, ready for site generation.



rake isolate[filename]




 # Move all other posts than the one currently being worked on to a temporary stash location (stas…



rake list




 # list tasks



rake new_page[filename]




 # Create a new page in source/(filename)/index.markdown



rake new_post[title]




 # Begin a new post in source/_posts



rake preview 




 # preview the site in a web browser



rake push




 # deploy public directory to github pages



rake rsync




 # Deploy website via rsync



rake set_root_dir[dir]




 # Update configurations to support publishing to root or sub directory



rake setup_github_pages[repo]




 # Set up _deploy folder and deploy branch for Github Pages deployment



rake update_source[theme]




 # Move source to source.old, install source theme updates, replace source/_includes/navigation.ht…



rake update_style[theme]




 # Move sass to sass.old, install sass theme updates, replace sass/custom with sass.old/custom



rake watch




 # Watch the site and regenerate when it changes

</description>

*2. Octopress使用的是atom.xml 所以要修改_config.yml中 subscribe_rss:“/rss.xml”

*3. 在Terminal中執行jekyll generate然後就會將Octopress中的文章由atom.xml轉成到public/rss.xml.xml，然後再由Wordpress後台Import rss就可以了！

entry.title: Octopress Rake Command Reference
entry.content:
rake clean

# Clean out caches: .pygments-cache, .gist-cache, .sass-cache

rake copydot[source,dest]

# copy dot files for deployment

rake deploy

# Default deploy task

rake gen_deploy

# Generate website and deploy

rake generate

# Generate jekyll site

rake install[theme]

# Initial setup for Octopress: copies the default theme into the path of Jekyll’s generator.

rake integrate

# Move all stashed posts back into the posts directory, ready for site generation.

rake isolate[filename]

# Move all other posts than the one currently being worked on to a temporary stash location (stas…

rake list

# list tasks

rake new_page[filename]

# Create a new page in source/(filename)/index.markdown

rake new_post[title]

# Begin a new post in source/_posts

rake preview

# preview the site in a web browser

rake push

# deploy public directory to github pages

rake rsync

# Deploy website via rsync

rake set_root_dir[dir]

# Update configurations to support publishing to root or sub directory

rake setup_github_pages[repo]

# Set up _deploy folder and deploy branch for Github Pages deployment

rake update_source[theme]

# Move source to source.old, install source theme updates, replace source/_includes/navigation.ht…

rake update_style[theme]

# Move sass to sass.old, install sass theme updates, replace sass/custom with sass.old/custom

rake watch

# Watch the site and regenerate when it changes
